Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Hillborough Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hillborough Way and Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Hillborough Way runs east and west from the intersection and is one of the main roads through the center of Oceancrest. Rosecrest Street runs north and south from the intersection, heading north past the Lithium Inlet towards Lyanden Castle, and south towards the southwestern corner of the city.
